resources.string: This application is designed to take video input and display it in a centralized location. Additional features that will hopefully be implemented looking tracking functionality

This section will report movement, camera desyncs, new video sources, and other notable features worth mentioning. All of this information will be in the current model be collected by a database managed by the creators of this app. The log will use a publish and subscribe method in which the user is subscribed a personal feed.
